item.title: The Trade Desk: After a 70% Plunge, This Could Be The Time to Buy
item.description: After a 70% plunge, The Trade Desk trades at 2020 levels with strong fundamentals, intact growth drivers, and its lowest valuation in years.

item.title: Tap Into 2026 AI Infrastructure Gains With This High-Growth ETF
item.description: The AI growth story is expected to take a step forward in 2026. That’s good news for shareholders of the Global X Data Center & Digital Infrastructure...

item.title: Strong Quarter, Weak Reaction: Why GitLab Shares Dropped
item.description: GitLab stock fell 13.5% post-earnings as weak AI monetization and bearish technicals dim investor outlook.

item.title: 3 Signs Tesla Is Starting December on the Front Foot
item.description: Tesla’s bounce off support, bullish analyst updates, and improving delivery numbers in China are setting the stage for a strong finish to the year.

item.title: The Nuclear Revival Is Real: SMR Stocks Flash Buy Signals After DOE Push
item.description: Federal funding for Small Modular Reactors ignites the nuclear renaissance as top firms NuScale Power and Oklo compete to power the world's AI boom.
